actions.name: Capture
actions.description: Add a new item to a file

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Notes to add to the item

parameters.name: scheduled
parameters.description: Schedule the item using a date in the format yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: Set the item deadline using a date in the format yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The name of the file, without an extension, to add the item to

parameters.description: Name of a template to apply

parameters.description: Whether or not the user can edit the item before it is created
